text: Mata kare wa itta. `Anata gata wa, gense no seikatsu ni oite, otagai no itsukushimi to shite arra o sashioite guzo o agamete iru. Daga fukkatsu no hi ni wa, anata gata wa tagaini (kankei o) hinin shi ai, tagaini noroi audearou. Sumai to ieba hi gokudeari, anata gata ni wa, don'na kyujo-sha mo nai nodearu
